text: Sage Stallone (May 5, 1976 - July 13, 2012) was an American movie actor. He was born in Los Angeles, California. He began acting in 1990 and was also a movie producer. He died in Studio City, Los Angeles of a heart attack caused by atherosclerosis. He was the elder son of Sylvester Stallone. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:1976 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from atherosclerosis
title: Sage Stallone
